Articles.Content: I wonder Does if someone lying on medical it's easy to detect if someone have disqualifying disease that is completely cured and not waiverable, does the doctor might detect it
Was opening a new thread really that important? This is your third thread on the basically the same topic.

Misleading flight authorities is not a smart thing to do, so how about we leave discussing this possibly criminal activity for other forums?

Closing the thread now.
